channel.title: Project-poom
channel.description:
hey guys,im atm working on my new server (all of me other servers werent ok). what my server has atm:
- specs for d scim,dds,d long,msb and some other. - dds hits double with the right gfx. - range has projectiles - working on forums - fixed some bugs - added dt quest (has many glitches :S). - when you wc logs you get them noted (so you dont have to bank every time). - switch magics by clicking on a portal. - healing spell - all safe besides wild. - 70 % dueling - fletching - farming - fishing - slayer (you do slayer on lessers) - added many npcs and pk places.
what to come
- all specs fully work 100% real rs gfx and hits - full citys (every city and every place has npcs you can buy,sell or talk to. - real rs window opens up when you login (so u click to play project poom. - working weapon emotes in walk,hit,run and defend - new quests and improve. - full rc like real rs - have npcs that are agressive in wild - have npcs that attack,defend and talk like real rs - have a client. - 100% bone burying,prayer and preaching - make npc atk you when you take the specific item near it.
well more to come so i will be updating.

item.title: Project-poom
item.dc:creator: @_lol $ lol $
item.description:
@_lol wrote:

yeah,but trying to code a 459 it makes you mad…
i can make a fun 317 server…tho its so crap but eh…

item.title: Project-poom
item.dc:creator: @aerozero94 aerozero94
item.description:
@aerozero94 wrote:

You can’t have a fun RS without a 459 client which contains the skillcapes and defenders. Which that means that you’ll need to be an expertise at coding to fix up the packets and all that stuff in the 459 client.

Read full topic
